title: Divine Char Dham Yatra
description: A spiritual journey to Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath. Complete package with stay and transport.

itinerary.title: Haridwar to Barkot
itinerary.details: Pick up from Haridwar/Dehradun. Drive to Barkot via Mussoorie.

itinerary.title: Yamunotri Trek
itinerary.details: Early morning drive to Jankichatti and trek to Yamunotri.

itinerary.title: Drop at Haridwar
itinerary.details: Morning tea and drive back to Haridwar for drop.

title: Mussoorie Queen of Hills
description: Escape to the Queen of Hills. Visit Kempty Falls, Gun Hill, and enjoy a stroll on Mall Road.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Mussoorie
itinerary.details: Check in to hotel and evening walk on Mall Road.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Kempty Falls, Company Garden, and George Everest.

title: Nainital Lake Paradise
description: Enjoy the lakes of Nainital and the serene views of Ranikhet and Kausani.

itinerary.title: Drive to Nainital
itinerary.details: Arrival and boating in Naini Lake.

itinerary.title: Nainital Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Tiffin Top, Zoo, and Hanuman Garhi.

itinerary.title: Ranikhet Excursion
itinerary.details: Drive to Ranikhet, visit Golf Course and Temples.
